p: HGT is a major driver of genetic variation in meningococcal populations. We found HGT in 16% of carriers, with 36 recombination events encompassing 51% of all nonhypermutable variable genes. This observation provides definitive evidence from individual infections that natural transformation between two phylogenetically divergent strains generates a high proportion of genetic variation in this bacterial species.
